short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A one-click camera check, right from the menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's a extension that lives in your menu, and when you click on it you get a view from your camera.

Say hello to instant confidence with iLook - Hand Mirror!
This handy app lives right in your Extension Menu Bar, giving you one-click access to your camera. No more searching for your video app - just a quick click for:

Video calls: Look your best with a pre-call camera check before jumping on.
Checking your surroundings: Need a glimpse of your background? It's just a click away.
Streaming or recording: See your camera feed and easily position the window for perfect framing.
Just-because confidence boost: Because sometimes you just need to check your fabulous self .
iLook - Hand Mirror!: Simple, convenient, and keeps you looking your best!
